value_i18n.ar_SA: Demos are available for you to showcase Liferay's benefits, features, and solutions for your prospect's unique business challenges.

value_i18n.ar_SA:
Getting Started

Demo bundles are hosted on our demo server and can be configured for presentation. You need to provide a GitHub ID in order to use them. Demo bundles cannot be downloaded. However, the data can be exported locally. Access to the demo server is for 7 days per request. 

Once a demo instance is ready to use, you will receive an email and the instructions to use it. If the demo has a specific script, you will find the same attached to the email as well.

For questions regarding any technical resource, please contact your Channel Account Manager or email: sales-engineering-channels@liferay.com.

Demo Recordings

It is recommended that you first watch the relevant demo recording to determine if the use case will be relevant to your presentation.
